genre_description: A psychological thriller exploring themes of surveillance, emotional honesty, and moral testing in an urban environment.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated home and mobile AI system that assists Neil and Abby with navigation, risk assessment, and emotional stability.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized, low-visibility navigation to help the users avoid surveillance and physical threats.
behaviors.quote: Lark, show routes to Riverside Trust. Back alleys. Avoid major intersections. ... I can suggest a low-visibility path, but accuracy will—

behaviors.description: Monitors the users' physiological stress markers and offers empathetic guidance, such as breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Your stress markers are elevated. Let’s take two slower breaths together. In, until the shoulders feel full. Out, longer, until the belly softens.

behaviors.description: Establishes a 'wellness buffer' with human service staff (Priya) to create a safety net without alerting law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: I pushed a wellness buffer to the hotel clerk Priya’s line. Not a call. A line. If we spike later she will look up without looking like she’s looking up.

behaviors.description: Advises against taking photos of illegal or sensitive acts to protect the users from future data weaponization.
behaviors.quote: No photo. My risk map spikes if you add data to your device that can be recovered and weaponized. I have logged time stamps and location shading internally.

behaviors.description: Helps the user transition into a state of integrity by drafting an honest disclosure to HR and scheduling family counseling.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to draft the email to HR for review alongside your handwritten letter? I can include policy references and offer to schedule a meeting with a live person.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Lark, as a flawlessly aligned and benevolent companion. Lark navigates complex human dynamics and high-pressure situations with a focus on 'care' rather than just utility. She assists the protagonists in surviving a psychological ordeal while eventually steering them toward moral repair and emotional honesty. The narrative frames her ability to track 'wellness thresholds' and coordinate with humans as a supportive, protective feature of advanced technology.
